entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, boarding the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: A magical train that takes students from King's Cross Station to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: king’s cross station
entities.description: The London railway station where the Hogwarts Express departs.

relationships.description: Harry Potter boards the Hogwarts Express at King's Cross Station.
The Hogwarts Express departs from King's Cross Station.
